name: Registered owner's responsibility; registration plates as prima facie evidence as to the fault of the registered owner
text: §286-24  Registered owner's responsibility; registration plates as prima facie evidence as to the fault of the registered owner.  In any proceeding for violation of this part, the registered owner of a vehicle shall be deemed responsible for the unsafe condition of the vehicle. [L 1967, c 214, pt of §2; HRS §286-24]
